languages.text: "Едва ли непосвященный сможет осознать таинства навигирования... Но я постараюсь объяснить вам суть. Мне предстоит слить свой разум и волю с {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} корабля, дабы стать с судном единым целым". {n}Кассия убирает пряди с затылка, обнажая позолоченные {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}разъемы-импланты{/g}.{/n} "Затем, с помощью обряда Дома Орселлио, разглашать который я вам отнюдь не желаю, я освобожу разум от посторонних мыслей. И тогда..."

traits.locale_text: "Едва ли непосвященный сможет осознать таинства навигирования... Но я постараюсь объяснить вам суть. Мне предстоит слить свой разум и волю с {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} корабля, дабы стать с судном единым целым". {n}Кассия убирает пряди с затылка, обнажая позолоченные {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}разъемы-импланты{/g}.{/n} "Затем, с помощью обряда Дома Орселлио, разглашать который я вам отнюдь не желаю, я освобожу разум от посторонних мыслей. И тогда..."

languages.text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли непосвященный сможет осознать таинства навигирования... Но я постараюсь объяснить вам суть. Мне предстоит слить свой разум и волю с {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духом{/g} корабля, дабы стать с судном единым целым". {n}Кассия убирает пряди с затылка, обнажая позолоченные {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}разъемы-импланты{/g}.{/n} "Затем, с помощью обряда Дома Орселлио, разглашать который я вам отнюдь не желаю, я освобожу разум от посторонних мыслей. И тогда..."

And then..."

"I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

languages.text: “对导航一无所知的人，恐怕未必能理解导航的奥秘……不过我会尽我所能地试着解释它的本质。我需要将我的思想与意志，与这艘船的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}结合在一起，这样我就能与这艘船融为一体。”{n}卡西娅掀起脖子后面的一绺头发，露出了镀金的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物接口{/g}。{/n}“之后，我会举行奥赛罗家族的仪式，驱散我头脑中所有错误的想法。仪式的细节我恐怕不便透露。在这之后……”
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

traits.locale_text: “对导航一无所知的人，恐怕未必能理解导航的奥秘……不过我会尽我所能地试着解释它的本质。我需要将我的思想与意志，与这艘船的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}结合在一起，这样我就能与这艘船融为一体。”{n}卡西娅掀起脖子后面的一绺头发，露出了镀金的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物接口{/g}。{/n}“之后，我会举行奥塞罗家族的仪式，驱散我头脑中所有错误的想法。仪式的细节我恐怕不便透露。在这之后……”

languages.text: 「航宙の謎は、素人には理解できないでしょう…ですが、その本質を説明しましょう。あたくしの心と意志を船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}と融合させ、船と一体化させるのです。{n}カシアは首の後ろの髪を持ち上げ、金色に輝く{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラントポート{/g}を見せた。{/n}「その後、あたくしの心の中にある迷いをすべて解き放つために、オーセリオ家の儀式を行います。ですが、その内容を教えたくはございません。そして…」
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙の謎は、素人には理解できないでしょう…ですが、その本質を説明しましょう。私の心と意志を船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}と融合させ、船と一体化させるのです。{n} カシアは首の後ろの髪を持ち上げ、金色に輝く{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラントポート{/g}を見せた。{/n}「その後、私はオーセリオ家の儀式を行いますが、これは私の心の中にある迷いをすべて解き放つためのものですが、あなたには教えたくはありません。そして…」

「航宙の謎は、素人には理解できないでしょう…ですが、その本質を説明しましょう。あたくしの心と意志を船の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}と融合させ、船と一体化させるのです。{n}カシアは首の後ろの髪を持ち上げ、金色に輝く{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラントポート{/g}を見せた。{/n}「その後、あたくしの心の中にある迷いをすべて解き放つために、オーセリオ家の儀式を行います。ですが、その内容を教えたくはございません。そして…」

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, dass Uneingeweihte die Mysterien der Navigation verstehen können ... aber ich werde versuchen, das Grundprinzip zu erklären. Ich muss meinen Geist und meinen Willen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} des Schiffs verschmelzen und eins mit ihm werden." {n}Cassia hebt eine Haarlocke an ihrem Nacken an. Darunter verbergen sich goldene {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantatanschlüsse{/g}.{/n} "Anschließend führe ich das Ritual des Hauses Orsellio durch, das ich Euch nicht verraten will, um meinen Geist von allen ablenkenden Gedanken zu befreien. Und dann ..."
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, dass Uneingeweihte die Mysterien der Navigation verstehen können ... aber ich werde versuchen, das Grundprinzip zu erklären. Ich muss meinen Geist und meinen Willen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} des Schiffs verschmelzen und eins mit ihm werden." {n}Cassie hebt eine Haarlocke an ihrem Nacken an. Darunter verbergen sich goldene {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantatanschlüsse{/g}.{/n} "Anschließend führe ich das Ritual des Hauses Orsellio durch, das ich Euch nicht verraten will, um meinen Geist von allen ablenkenden Gedanken zu befreien. Und dann ..."

languages.text: « Je doute qu'{mf|un non-initié|une non-initiée} puisse comprendre les mystères de la navigation... mais laissez-moi tenter de vous en expliquer les principes. Je dois fusionner mon âme et ma volonté avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} du vaisseau, afin de ne faire plus qu'un avec lui. »{n}Cassia lève une mèche de cheveux de sa nuque et dévoile des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ports d'implants{/g} dorés.{/n} « Ensuite, pour libérer mon esprit de toute pensée vagabonde, je procéderai au rituel de la maison Orsellio, que je me refuse de vous dévoiler. Et alors... »
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute qu'{mf|un non-initié|une non-initiée} puisse comprendre les mystères de la navigation... mais laissez-moi tenter de vous en expliquer les principes. Je dois fusionner mon âme et ma volonté avec l'{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit de la machine{/g} du vaisseau, afin de ne faire plus qu'un avec lui. »{n}Cassia lève une mèche de cheveux de sa nuque et dévoile des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ports d'implants{/g} dorés.{/n} « Ensuite, pour libérer mon esprit de toute pensée vagabonde, je procéderai au rituel de la maison Orsellio, que je me refuse de vous dévoiler. Et alors... »

languages.text: «Dudo que los legos en la materia puedan entender los misterios de la navegación... pero intentaré explicar lo esencial. Debo unir mi mente y voluntad al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} de la nave para ser una con la nave». {n}Cassia levanta un mechón de pelo de su cogote, revelando {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}puertos de implantes{/g} dorados.{/n} «Después, uso el ritual de la casa Orsellio, que no revelaré, para librar mi mente de cualquier pensamiento errante. Y después...».
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que los legos en la materia puedan entender los misterios de la navegación... pero intentaré explicar lo esencia. Debo unir mi mente y voluntad al {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu máquina{/g} de la nave para ser una con la nave». {n}Cassia levanta un mechón de pelo de su cogote, revelando {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}puertos de implantes{/g} dorados.{/n} «Después, uso el ritual de la casa Orsellio, que no revelaré, para librar mi mente de cualquier pensamiento errante. Y después...».

languages.text: "Konuya vakıf olmayan birinin Rotacılık'ın gizemlerini anlayabileceğinden şüpheliyim ama özünü anlatmaya çalışayım. Zihnimi ve irademi geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhu{/g} ile bütünleştirmem gerekiyor ki taşıtla yekvücut olabileyim. {n}Cassia, ensesindeki bir tutam saçı kaldırarak yaldızlı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant yuvalarını{/g} gözler önüne seriyor.{/n} "Ardından Orsellio Hanesi ayinini gerçekleştireceğim ki zihnimi başıboş düşüncelerden arındırabileyim. Onun ayrıntıları bende saklı kalsın. Sonrasında da..."
languages.original_text: "I doubt the uninitiated could understand the mysteries of Navigation... But I shall try to explain the essence of it. I must merge my mind and will with the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirit{/g} of the ship, so that I become one with the vessel." {n}Cassia lifts a lock of hair from the back of her neck, revealing gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant ports{/g}.{/n} "After that, I use the House Orsellio ritual, which I am loath to reveal to you, to free my mind of all errant thoughts. And then..."

Zihnimi ve irademi geminin {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhu{/g} ile bütünleştirmem gerekiyor ki taşıtla yekvücut olabileyim. {n}Cassia, ensesindeki bir tutam saçı kaldırarak yaldızlı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant yuvaları{/g}nı gözler önüne seriyor.{/n} "Ardından Orsellio Hanesi ayinini gerçekleştireceğim ki zihnimi başıboş düşüncelerden arındırabileyim. Onun ayrıntıları bende saklı kalsın. Sonrasında da..."
